description: Learn how to make luscious roast tomato, rosemary, garlic and chickpea pasta sauce in three easy steps. This speedy linguine is the perfect no-fuss dinner.
name: Roast Tomato & Chickpea Linguine Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 rosemary sprigs, leaves picked, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fanforced. Place chickpeas, tomatoes, rosemary, garlic and chilli in a baking dish and toss to combine. Roast for 15 minutes or until tomatoes begin to blister.
Meanwhile, cook linguine in a saucepan of boiling, salted water according to packet instructions. Drain.
Add linguine, butter, lemon juice and half the basil to baking dish and toss to combine. Season with pepper. Serve linguine topped with remaining basil.
